text: The invoice generator crashes every time I try to create a bill for a client which means I literally cannot charge anyone right now.
label: bug

text: I would have been charged less if your discount code field wasn't hidden behind a collapsed menu that I didn't even know existed until after payment processed.
label: billing

text: Why is there no way to undo a deletion when your own system accidentally bulk-deleted 3 years of my project files during what was supposed to be a routine sync?
label: bug

text: I'm not asking for a refund but I genuinely don't understand why my usage-based bill jumped from $23 to $847 when my traffic actually decreased this month.
label: billing

text: The 'export to PDF' button technically works but produces a completely blank document so I'm not sure if this is a bug or if I'm missing a required setting somewhere.
label: bug

text: Your pricing page says $10/month but the checkout page showed $12/month and I only noticed after seeing my bank statement reflect the higher amount.
label: billing

text: I can't tell if the two-hour sync delay is intentional behavior or a performance issue but either way it makes the real-time collaboration feature completely useless for our team.
label: bug

text: The payment failed error message told me to contact my bank but my bank says they never even received an authorization request from your payment processor.
label: bug

text: Would it technically be possible to add a feature that lets us dispute charges directly in the app instead of having to email support and wait 5 business days?
label: feature_request

text: My account shows I'm on the free tier but I'm being charged $29/month and when I try to upgrade to actually get premium features the system says I'm already subscribed.
label: billing

text: The mobile app works perfectly but the exact same account on the web version shows all my data as corrupted Chinese characters.
label: bug

text: I think I was double-charged but I'm not 100% sure because one charge says 'pending' and the other says 'completed' but they're for the same amount on the same day.
label: billing

text: Is there a reason the API rate limit applies to failed authentication attempts because I'm being locked out before I can even successfully connect.
label: bug

text: We need the ability to set negative quantities in inventory because we operate on a backorder model and your system treating zero as a floor is breaking our entire workflow.
label: feature_request

text: My teammates can see a 'analytics' tab that I cannot see anywhere in my interface even though we supposedly have identical permissions and subscription levels.
label: bug

text: The student discount was approved according to the email I received but my account still reflects full pricing and I've already been charged twice at the non-discounted rate.
label: billing

text: Why does the 'remember me' checkbox exist if the session expires after exactly 15 minutes regardless of whether it's checked or not?
label: bug

text: I called to cancel before the renewal date and the representative confirmed it verbally but I have no written proof and now you're saying the call never happened.
label: billing

text: It would be helpful if error messages contained actual information instead of just saying 'Something went wrong' with a generic error code that returns zero Google results.
label: feature_request

text: The chart visualization shows my revenue as negative $40,000 which is either a massive bug or your system knows something about my business that I don't.
label: bug

text: I explicitly selected the monthly plan but was enrolled in annual billing and now you're telling me the annual commitment is non-refundable even though I never agreed to it.
label: billing

text: Can we get read receipts for shared documents so I can stop having meetings where people claim they didn't see the materials I sent three weeks ago?
label: feature_request

text: The forgot password flow sends a reset link that expires before the email even arrives in my inbox making it impossible to recover my account.
label: bug

text: My nonprofit tax-exempt status was verified last year but I'm suddenly being charged sales tax again and nobody can tell me what changed.
label: billing

text: Please add a way to archive projects without deleting them because right now my only options are keeping clutter or losing data permanently.
label: feature_request

text: The file upload succeeds according to the progress bar and confirmation message but the file literally does not exist when I go to access it.
label: bug

text: I have two separate accounts that are somehow being billed to the same payment method and now I can't update the card on one without affecting the other.
label: billing

text: Would it be unreasonable to expect the search function to find results that contain my search terms instead of seemingly random unrelated content?
label: bug

text: The 7-day free trial apparently started when I created an account six months ago even though I never activated or used the trial until today.
label: billing

text: We need conditional logic in forms because right now I have to show 47 irrelevant fields to every user instead of just the 3-5 that apply to their situation.
label: feature_request

text: Clicking 'save draft' actually publishes the content publicly which is the exact opposite of what that button should do.
label: bug

text: The enterprise contract clearly states $500/month but invoices have been $650/month for the past year and apparently nobody noticed until our new accountant flagged it.
label: billing

text: Please let us customize the dashboard layout because the current default wastes 80% of screen space on widgets nobody on our team has ever clicked.
label: feature_request

text: The automated backup completed successfully according to the logs but attempting to restore from it produces a file that's 94% smaller than the original.
label: bug

text: I understand there's a currency conversion fee but a 23% markup on top of the exchange rate seems less like a fee and more like a surcharge you forgot to disclose.
label: billing

text: It would save everyone time if the system could auto-detect duplicate entries instead of letting us create seventeen versions of the same contact.
label: feature_request

text: The logout button doesn't actually log me out—it just redirects to the homepage where I'm still fully authenticated with all my data visible.
label: bug

text: My invoice shows charges for 15 team seats but we only have 6 employees and I never authorized adding seats that don't correspond to actual human beings.
label: billing

text: Why isn't there a way to bulk edit tags when you clearly designed a system that encourages tagging everything and now I have 10,000 items to update manually?
label: feature_request

text: The timestamp on every record is exactly 7 hours in the future which makes our audit trail look like we're submitting compliance documents before meetings even happen.
label: bug

text: Charging my card in a currency I didn't select and then adding a conversion fee on top of the unfavorable exchange rate feels like I'm being billed for your system's limitations.
label: billing

text: A simple 'select all' checkbox would prevent the carpal tunnel I'm developing from individually clicking 500 items every time I need to perform a batch operation.
label: feature_request

text: The permission settings I configured are being randomly reset to defaults overnight which means confidential client files keep becoming visible to our entire organization.
label: bug

text: I'm being charged the legacy pricing that was supposedly grandfathered in but at the new higher rate which is somehow both grandfathered and not grandfathered simultaneously.
label: billing

text: Please add keyboard shortcuts because using this application with only a mouse is like being forced to type with one finger when you know how to touch-type.
label: feature_request

text: The 'delete my account' button triggers a workflow that sends me promotional emails about features I'd lose instead of actually deleting anything.
label: bug

text: The refund was processed according to your support team but it's been 47 business days and neither my bank nor your billing portal show any record of it.
label: billing

text: An offline mode seems like a basic expectation for a mobile app in 2024 rather than the premium feature you're apparently planning to charge extra for.
label: feature_request

text: Every PDF I export has my confidential watermark on the first page but not pages 2-47 which completely defeats the purpose of having confidential watermarks.
label: bug

text: I was charged a 'service restoration fee' to restore service that was interrupted because your payment system rejected a valid card for no stated reason.
label: billing

text: The ability to comment on specific cells in a spreadsheet instead of the entire document would make collaborative review actually collaborative instead of chaotic.
label: feature_request

text: Pasting content from any external source strips all formatting which I understand but it also strips the actual text leaving me with an empty clipboard.
label: bug

text: My annual subscription apparently auto-renewed 6 weeks before the actual renewal date and customer service says this is intentional but won't explain why.
label: billing

text: Version history is useless if it only stores the last 3 versions when our compliance requirements mandate 7 years of document revision tracking.
label: feature_request

text: The accessibility screen reader announces every button as 'button' without any label which means blind users have to click randomly and hope for the best.
label: bug

text: The family plan pricing shows $14.99 for up to 6 users but adding a 4th user triggered a charge for $44.97 as if each user costs the full amount.
label: billing

text: Being able to set different notification preferences for different projects would prevent me from being woken up at 3am for low-priority updates I don't care about.
label: feature_request

text: The browser back button doesn't go back to the previous page—it goes back to a blank loading screen that requires a full refresh to escape from.
label: bug

text: My subscription shows as 'active' in my account dashboard but as 'expired' in the billing portal and I'm simultaneously being denied access and charged monthly.
label: billing

text: A simple integration with calendar apps would eliminate the manual process of copying event details between three different platforms that should obviously talk to each other.
label: feature_request

text: The image compression algorithm makes every photo look like it was taken through a screen door even when I upload at maximum quality settings.
label: bug

text: The pricing tier I selected explicitly advertised 'unlimited storage' but I'm now being told there's a 'fair use policy' cap that was mentioned nowhere during checkout.
label: billing

text: Custom fields would allow us to track the data that actually matters to our business instead of forcing our workflow into your predetermined categories.
label: feature_request

text: Sorting by date puts December 2023 before December 2022 which suggests someone implemented alphabetical sorting on date strings and called it a day.
label: bug

text: The tax amount on my invoice is calculated on the total after discount but I'm being charged tax on the pre-discount amount which is a $47 difference.
label: billing

text: Email notifications that include the actual content of the message would save me from clicking through to the app 50 times a day just to read one sentence.
label: feature_request

text: The 'required field' validation triggers after I've already submitted the form rather than before which means I lose all my other inputs and have to start over.
label: bug

text: I cancelled during the 30-day money-back guarantee window and was told I don't qualify because the guarantee only applies to new customers and I had a trial 2 years ago.
label: billing

text: Exporting data in a standard format like CSV shouldn't require a premium subscription when you're essentially holding my own data hostage.
label: feature_request

text: The single sign-on integration works for initial login but immediately creates a duplicate local account that conflicts with my SSO identity.
label: bug

text: My receipt shows a billing address in Texas but I live in Oregon and have never entered a Texas address anywhere which makes me question what else is wrong.
label: billing

text: A way to preview changes before publishing would prevent the daily panic of realizing I just pushed something broken to 50,000 users.
label: feature_request

text: The 'unsaved changes' warning appears even when I haven't made any changes and doesn't appear when I have made changes that are about to be lost.
label: bug

text: The promotional pricing required entering a credit card 'just for verification' and then charged me immediately despite promising no charge until the trial ended.
label: billing

text: Allowing users to set their own default values would save me from changing the same 12 settings manually every single time I create a new project.
label: feature_request

text: Copy and paste works within the application but pasting anything into an external program produces corrupted binary data instead of the text I copied.
label: bug

text: I'm being charged in a currency that doesn't match my account settings or my card's currency or my country of residence and nobody can explain why.
label: billing

text: A proper templating system would replace the 47 identical documents I've created with one reusable template and variable fields.
label: feature_request

text: The mobile app requires camera permissions to function at all even for features that have absolutely nothing to do with the camera.
label: bug

text: The usage meter shows I've used 150% of my allocation but won't tell me what specifically consumed that usage or how to avoid it next month.
label: billing

text: Custom report scheduling would let me automate the Monday morning export I've done manually every week for the past three years.
label: feature_request

text: Scrolling down the page causes the header to flicker and redraw constantly which is either a rendering bug or an aggressive attempt to give users seizures.
label: bug

text: I paid for a lifetime license 4 years ago and you've now transitioned to subscription-only and are telling me my lifetime license expires next month.
label: billing

text: Being able to rename the default categories would prevent the confusion of having to explain to every new team member that 'Miscellaneous' actually means 'Urgent'.
label: feature_request

text: The drag-and-drop functionality works perfectly until you drag something near the edge of the visible area where it teleports to a random location.
label: bug

text: You charged me a 'early termination fee' for cancelling a month-to-month subscription that had no contract and no mention of termination fees anywhere.
label: billing

text: Two-way sync with external databases would eliminate the 4-hour daily process of manually reconciling records between systems.
label: feature_request

text: The character counter shows 0/500 characters remaining but rejects my input at 423 characters claiming I've exceeded the limit.
label: bug

text: My card was declined for 'security reasons' but your system kept retrying every hour for 6 days and eventually processed 7 duplicate charges when my limit reset.
label: billing

text: The ability to @mention specific people in comments would prevent the current system of hoping the right person happens to notice a reply buried in a thread.
label: feature_request

text: The 'compact view' option actually makes everything larger and the 'expanded view' makes everything smaller which suggests the labels got swapped during development.
label: bug

text: I signed up under a promotional partner discount that your billing system doesn't recognize even though your sales team was the one who sent me the signup link.
label: billing

text: Saved filters would eliminate the daily ritual of re-entering the same 8 filter criteria that I use for every single search.
label: feature_request

text: Clicking any link in the mobile app opens an in-app browser that can't access my password manager which makes every link effectively unusable.
label: bug

text: The invoice date is three weeks after the charge date and the due date is two weeks before the charge date which makes the timeline physically impossible.
label: billing

text: A proper sandbox environment would let us test configurations without the current workaround of maintaining a separate paid account purely for testing.
label: feature_request

text: The auto-save feature creates a new version every 3 seconds which burns through version history limits and makes finding actual meaningful changes impossible.
label: bug

text: You increased my rate mid-contract citing 'market adjustments' but the contract I signed specifically says the rate is fixed for the 24-month term.
label: billing

text: Native markdown support would remove the need for the browser extension I built myself because the WYSIWYG editor mangles formatting constantly.
label: feature_request

text: The date picker only allows selecting dates from a calendar that starts in January 2020 which is problematic for the historical records I need to enter from 2019.
label: bug

text: My invoice contains a line item called 'Adjustment' with no description and a charge of $234.67 that nobody in support can explain or justify.
label: billing

text: A true mobile-responsive design would mean I don't have to pinch-zoom and scroll horizontally on every single page just to see the full content.
label: feature_request

text: The spell-check feature flags every technical term as misspelled but offers no way to add words to a custom dictionary so every document is a sea of red squiggles.
label: bug

text: The 'pause subscription' option charged me a $15 'pause fee' that wasn't mentioned anywhere in the modal that I clicked to avoid being charged.
label: billing

text: Webhook support for real-time event notifications would replace the inefficient polling system that hammers your API every 30 seconds from 10,000 of our devices.
label: feature_request
